channel.title: 0.8.24 Patch Notes
channel.description:
##General: * Changed The Black Rose to The Unseen. * Deathnotes no longer appear if the killer did not draw in them.
##Butler: * Loud Whisper and Private Matter have been removed.
##Enforcer: * Threaten has been removed.
##Herbalist: * Unearth ability was changed into a night ability. * The player can now select a dead player at night to create a false report for. * The player chooses who they want to appear as the dead player's killer. * The dead player's fake killer is revealed the following morning. * The dead player's real killer will be revealed to the Herbalist.
##Knight: * Intimidate has been removed.
##Physician: * Exhume ability was changed into a night ability. * The player can now select a dead player at night to examine. * The dead player's killers are revealed the following morning.
##Possessor: * Possessor no longer dies to the Knight's Protection ability.
##Princess: * Stealth Slap has been removed:
##Servant: * Loud Whisper and Private Matter have been removed.
##Bug Fixes: * Terms checkmark fixed. * Fixed a bug where Reaper would ignore Ice Ward and the Mercenary guarding. * Fixed bug where Prince would execute targets without hitting the button. * Fixed deathnote bugs. * Some other shit I forgot to write down.

item.title: 0.8.24 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
##General:

  • Changed The Black Rose to The Unseen.
  • Deathnotes no longer appear if the killer did not draw in them.

##Butler:

  • Loud Whisper and Private Matter have been removed.

##Enforcer:

  • Threaten has been removed.

##Herbalist:

  • Unearth ability was changed into a night ability.
  • The player can now select a dead player at night to create a false report for.
  • The player chooses who they want to appear as the dead player’s killer.
  • The dead player’s fake killer is revealed the following morning.
  • The dead player’s real killer will be revealed to the Herbalist.

##Knight:

  • Intimidate has been removed.

##Physician:

  • Exhume ability was changed into a night ability.
  • The player can now select a dead player at night to examine.
  • The dead player’s killers are revealed the following morning.

##Possessor:

  • Possessor no longer dies to the Knight’s Protection ability.

##Princess:

  • Stealth Slap has been removed:

##Servant:

  • Loud Whisper and Private Matter have been removed.

##Bug Fixes:

  • Terms checkmark fixed.
  • Fixed a bug where Reaper would ignore Ice Ward and the Mercenary guarding.
  • Fixed bug where Prince would execute targets without hitting the button.
  • Fixed deathnote bugs.
  • Some other shit I forgot to write down.

Read full topic
